metadata.name: Blockchain Baller
metadata.description:
'Blockchain Baller' is a playful look at an American pastime! 
An appreciation of the shapes and patterns that exist on a basketball court, but with a non conventional finish to them!
As part of the Olympian Collection 'Baller' is an introduction to the aerial view of the sports we hold so dear, and mean so much to us! 

This NFT includes a signed single edition (1/1) 24 x 30 museum grade fine art paper print - will ship worldwide.
